entry.title: NewsMap rocks!
entry.summary:
I just discovered NewsMap via 37 signals.

This is a really nice way of seeing what the hot stories are in any given category. I just set it to be my home page in Flock.

BTW, you are using Flock, right? Easily the best browser around. The photo bar integration of flickr is worth the price of admission alone. It’s totally built for the way I use the web today – flickr for photos, del.icio.us for bookmarks. I might switch from typo) or patch it (if I find the time) so that it works with the integrated blogging features of Flock.
entry.content:
I just discovered NewsMap via 37 signals.

This is a really nice way of seeing what the hot stories are in any given category. I just set it to be my home page in Flock.

BTW, you are using Flock, right? Easily the best browser around. The photo bar integration of flickr is worth the price of admission alone. It’s totally built for the way I use the web today – flickr for photos, del.icio.us for bookmarks. I might switch from typo) or patch it (if I find the time) so that it works with the integrated blogging features of Flock.

entry.title: Comment on NewsMap rocks! by John Lam
entry.content: I'd love to see keychain integration with Firefox / Flock as well. But I'm an old school write-down my passwords kind of guy (and no, they're not stickied to my monitor!) so it's not a super inconvenience to re-enter my passwords.

entry.title: Comment on NewsMap rocks! by Eric Hodel
entry.content: I can't use a browser that doesn't integrate with keychain. Typing in all my passwords again isn't worth the bother.
